text: Tunisia are scheduled to compete in the 2020 Summer Paralympics in Tokyo, Japan from 24 August to 5 September, 2021. == Athletics == Rima Abdelli, Walid Ktila, Mohamed Farhat Chida, Yassine Gharbi, Sonia Mansour, Maroua Ibrahmi, Raoua Tlili and Hania Aidi are among the athletes to represent Tunisia at the 2020 Summer Paralympics. ;Men's track {|class=wikitable style="font-size:95%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heats !colspan="3"|Final |- !Result !Rank !Result !Rank |- |Mohamed Farhat Chida |Men's 400m T38 | | | | |- |rowspan=2|Yassine Gharbi |Men's 400m T54 | | | | |- |Men's 800m T54 | | | | |- |rowspan=2|Walid Ktila |Men's 100m T34 | | | | |- |Men's 800m T34 | | | | |} ;Men's field {|class=wikitable style="font- size:95%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="3"|Final |- !Result !Points !Rank |- |Ahmed Ben Moslah |Men's shot put F37 | | | |- |Yassine Guenichi |Men's shot put F36 | | | |} ;Women's track {|class=wikitable style="font-size:95%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heats !colspan="2"|Final |- !Result !Rank !Result !Rank |- |Sonia Mansour |Women's 400m T38 | | | | |} ;Women's field {|class=wikitable style="font-size:95%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="3"|Final |- !Result !Points !Rank |- |Rima Abdelli |Women's shot put F40 | | | |- |Hania Aidi |Women's javelin throw F54 | | | |- |Maroua Ibrahmi |Women's club throw F32 | | | |- |Raja Jebali |Women's shot put F40 | | | |- |rowspan=2|Raoua Tlili |Women's discus throw F41 | | | |- |Women's shot put F41 | | | |} ==Table tennis== One male competitor has been selected to compete in the Paralympics after winning in the African Para Table Tennis Championships in Alexandria. This will be the first time that Tunisia will be competing in table tennis at the Games. {|class=wikitable style |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="4"|Preliminaries !Quarterfinals !Semifinals !colspan="2"|Final / |- !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Rank !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Rank |- |Karim Gharsallah |Men's singles C11 | | | | | | | | |} ==See also== *Tunisia at the Paralympics *Tunisia at the 2020 Summer Olympics ==References== Category:Nations at the 2020 Summer Paralympics Category:Tunisia at the Paralympics Category:2021 in Tunisian sport
title: Tunisia at the 2020 Summer Paralympics
